changeSet.author: JocLRojas
changeSet.sql: UPDATE public.utm_logstash_filter SET filter_version='2.0.0', logstash_filter='# Generic syslog filter, version 2.0.0 # Allow processing of any syslog log pipeline: - dataTypes: - syslog steps: - grok: patterns: - field_name: log.message pattern: ''(.*)'' source: raw' WHERE id=1520;
